channel.title: Diablo II
channel.description: How many of you guys play or have played Diablo II. I think it's very good for the graphics and it's kinda old isn't it? Any way how many of you guy play it?

item.description:
@system wrote:

If anyone still plays add Frost21,just started up again…level 5 hammerdin Uswest//sc

[br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2007, 10:06:57 AM[/size][hr]Well got boring since ladder is resetting in like 2-3days cant remember…

Well hopefully someone on this forum tries this…since I just downloaded it and thought it was really really cool…

http://modsbylaz.planetdiablo.gamespy.com/

Check out the info on the mod…Hopefully we can have a game together…on host/tcp connection thing :)lemme know if you wanna .

item.title: Diablo II
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

I quit my pally, he sucked
Now I have a level 69 ice sorc named Ancient_Ice on west. Does anyone think I could trade a CoH boneweave for a CoH dusk shroud or w/e?

Edit: Sorc is now level 76-77, I traded the CoH for enigma, crown of thieves, and a druid torch. I’m going to trade the druid torch and maybe something else for a sorc torch
Crown of thieves is on my act 2 nightmare merc, along with infinity and fortitude.

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo II
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[quote=“Neglectica, post:10, topic:3822”]diablo = fun, they let u bot withouyt banning you … lol

i just love d2!
(europe non ladder)[/quote]

They DO NOT let you bot. You just don’t get banned as much becuase Blizzard is focusing on WoW right now, lol. Besides, botting isn’t that good for the game. All you get is rare items and level up without having to click.

Read full topic
